name: ELM (stallout)
description:
ELM is a stealth/action game where you play as a reconnaissance robot that is sent into the crash site of a hostile alien lifeform. You will need to quietly navigate and run from the aliens while gathering biological samples and transporting them back to an extraction point. Players will use a variety of upgrades and powerups to allow them to sneak past or fight back against the alien menace! 

This game was made in seven weeks with both an alpha and beta as well as a dev log that you can find here: https://stallout.wixsite.com/elm-game 

  • Concept Artist: Janelle Knight: https://www.artstation.com/stallout
  • 3D Artist: Christian Orion Adler: https://coadler.com/
  • 3D Artist:  Nick Parker: https://nickparker.carbonmade.co
  • Developer and Audio: Andrew Fernandes: aefernandes@wpi.edu
  • Developer: Duncan Bertetti: dbertetti@wpi.edu
  • Developer: Eddie Matava: ejmatava@wpi.edu
